fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Form an alliance between two people.
- Convert an alliance to the Civilization faction. (Costs 12 gold) (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Alliances gain a private chat. If one member of an alliance dies, the other will be dealt an Overkill attack immediately. If alliance members are of different factions, they may win with any evil factions that one of the alliance members is a member of.
- You may only create two alliances.
- Alliances are permanent.
- Civilizations may not be alliance members.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were bludgeoned by a Cree Okihtcitaw.” (Factional Kill)
“Their alliance member has fallen.” (Alliance Member Died)
“You have entered an alliance with ___!” (Alliance Created)
“Your win condition has been changed.” (Win condition changed due to alliance)
